ygData.subject: Re: Hail all of you, a quick question
ygData.messageBody:
> Please email me the stories.
>
> > ----------
> > From: Zwanenburg, John[SMTP:ZWANENJ@...]
> > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > Sent: Wednesday, May 19, 1999 12:41 AM
> > To: 'warriors_eq@onelist.com'
> > Subject: [warriors_eq] Hail all of you, a quick question
> >
> > From: "Zwanenburg, John" <ZWANENJ@...>
> >
> > Hail my fellow warriors,
> >
> > I am writing a story based on a few of my EQ chars as well as some of my
> > friends chars, as of now i have a couple of pilot chapters finished,
> this
> > is
> > just to ask you if you want to read any of them, i want to get some
> > critisism so reply back if you want me to email them directly to you and
> i
> > will....
> >
> > thanks alot,
> > Lothaniel.
> > John Zwanenburg
> > Tips Support/Support Sipt
> > Tel: (613) 998-2745
> >
> > > ----------
> > > From: Jason Coan[SMTP:COANJ@...]
> > > Reply To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > Sent: Tuesday, May 18, 1999 10:41 AM
> > > To: warriors_eq@onelist.com
> > > Subject: Re: [warriors_eq] (no subject)
> > >
> > > From: "Jason Coan" <COANJ@...>
> > >
> > > heh, I started a Wood Elf warrior last night to make arrows for my DE,
> > > since there is nowhere for darks to buy fletching materials....got him
> > up
> > > to 5th in about 3 hours, without a single twinked item on him.....but
> > > anyways......
> > >
> > > 1. At the various gypsy camps
> > >
> > > 2. I've had many warriors with many types of armor, I may be wrong,
> but
> > > I've never noticed between ring, chain, or banded, other than weight.
> > >
> > > 3. parry is blocking an attack
> > >
> > > 4. To my knowledge enchanters can not put perminant enchantments on
> > items
> > > other than bars of copper, silver, gold, plat.
> > >
> > > 5. never messed much with quest, yet to see or hear of a low level
> > quest
> > > that is actually worth the time and effort.
> > >
> > > Salr D'Taynkk
> > > Dark Warrior of The Kith
> > > Veeshan
> > >
> > > >>> "Dean B." <gino_14@...> 5.17.99 8:31:24 PM >>>
> > > From: "Dean B." <gino_14@...>
> > >
> > > Hail All !
> > > Not To brag - I'm a Human, Warrior(lvl 10) and I just got this game
> > about
> > > one month ago. I'm still getting used to it's lingo and such-forth
> but
> > > I'm
> > > having a few questions/help/input thats on my mind.
> > >
> > >
> > > 1. Now, I need a magical sword, so that I can kill Wisp's... I'm
> > thinking
> > >
> > > about investing into a 'Combined 2H Sword'. I've herd they can very
> > from
> > > 75pp - 120pp. I'm wondering where I can get it.
> > >
> > > P.S Where is the best place to hunt wisp's. (I've herd they offer good
> > > money
> > > drops)
> > >
> > >
> > > 2. For a lvl 10, I have RingMail tunic, RingMail pants & RingMail
> > > sleeve's.
> > > I've switched to RingMail couse I've found there a little bit less
> > then
> > > Banded Mail and you get the same AC but a little more weight. I've
> also
> >
> > > noticed that with RingMail that monsters tend to miss a bit more and I
> > > dodge
> > > more quicker then Banded Mail.
> > >
> > >
> > > 3. When I reach lvl 12, What does perry skill do?
> > >
> > >
> > > 4. I was wondering, I have a Kite Shield and one Mino Battle Axe.
> When
> > I
> > >
> > > get dule wielding, I'll buy another Mino Battle Axe... Is there some
> way
> > I
> > >
> > > can contact a lvl35+ Enchanter and he/she could make my Mino Battle
> Axe
> > > magical somehow OR even make the delay better?
> > >
> > >
> > > 5. Ok, I'm having trouble with some quest's... What are good ones
> that
> > > offer good money, Experience Points & and a all around good item?
> > >
> > > Thanks for reading my newbie questions!
> > > Dean Boyle
> > >
> > > Server: Karana
> > > Name: Dealan <The Light of Norrath>
> > >
> > >
> > >
